fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Sponsors: During the Merchant event, you may take 3 non-special cards of your choice instead of 1.
- Reputations: Learn two playerâ€™s names. At least one of them is true non-Chaos. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reevaluate: Choose 1 card. It will gain one of Reforged, Satcheled, or Upgraded randomly. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Replicate: Choose a non-special card in your hand. Duplicate it, with modifiers. [1 use, Unique]
- Tariff: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, they discard a random card at the start of the next phase, Influenceable. [3 uses, 1 CD]
